pages.title: Soybeans
pages.text: Soybeans are the same as ordinary wheat seeds and can be easily collected. (Unless there is any fluctuation)

pages.title: NetherSoybeans
pages.text: Besides, you can find other strange soybeans that you can find when you go to the Nether.

pages.title: SoulSoybeans
pages.text: ...and you can find soul variant too!
